verbs.description: In a gesture of goodwill to President Trump by North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un in advance of their summit , [ARG1: three Americans] [V: imprisoned] [ARGM-LOC: in North Korea] were freed and allowed to return home with Secretary of State Mike Pompeo .

In a gesture of goodwill to President Trump by North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un in advance of their summit , three Americans imprisoned in North Korea [V: were] freed and allowed to return home with Secretary of State Mike Pompeo .

In a gesture of goodwill to President Trump by North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un in advance of their summit , [ARG1: three Americans imprisoned in North Korea] were freed and allowed to [V: return] [ARG4: home] [ARGM-MNR: with Secretary of State Mike Pompeo] .
